text: Any wilful false swearing on the part of any witness before any trial board mentioned in § 5-1001 as to any material fact shall be deemed perjury and shall be punished in the manner prescribed by law for such offense.

title.text: Police, Firefighters, Medical Examiner, and Forensic Sciences. (Refs & Annos)
